thread.title: India set South Africa 248-run target in 2nd ODI
thread.title_full: India set South Africa 248-run target in 2nd ODI

title: India set South Africa 248-run target in 2nd ODI
text:
India set South Africa 248-run target in 2nd ODI India set South Africa 248-run target in 2nd ODI Indore, Oct 14, 2015 (PTI) 
Electing to bat, India scored 247 for nine against South Africa in the second One Day International cricket match, here today. Skipper Mahendra Singh top scored for the hosts with his unbeaten 92-run knock.Brief Scores:India: 247 for 9 in 50 overs. (MS Dhoni 92 not out, Ajikya Rahane 51; Dale Steyn 3/49).
